lyric.verse: Ayumi mo amai tsutanai koe Sawaganai de chinomigo-chan Hitattenai de shimita gurai de Nureta nante waraeru kara Doro ni mamireta mamagoto asobi nano ne Yumemonogatari nigeokureta no wa dare? Otogi no kuni maboroshi wo mita no
lyric.chorus: * Negai wa nagareboshi yo Kanau mono naraba Hageshiku furitsuzukete Tsuki sae mo otoshite Yozora wo irodoru omoi nado Moetsukite shimaeba ii Akeru koto mo nai Yamiyo wa yasuraka ni
lyric.verse: Hirakanai de hirogenai de Yasashii te de sawaranai de Nagusamenai de kamawanai de Itawaranai de arukeru kara Kono mune ga ude ga kami ga nodo no oku de Tsugihagi darake de tsumugi hajimeteiru Kareru hodo naitemo Kono mama de
lyric.chorus: * repeat Watashi wa okizari ni sarete Iku no dakara Shizumete modorenai gurai Douka hashitte Soramimi dake wo tayori ni shite Hidoku nureteru kioku wa Anata wo mata Nee sagashite shimau kara
